company: TBrO Ablage tut fur biologlsche Forschung GmbH
subject: Analysis of MS, Project VIRGO III
message: Dear Gerry: Please find attached the latest results concerning the analysis of MS of the research cigarette VIRGO-YMF80 and standard reference cigarette 1R4F. The work on this project will be continued next year. Merry Christmas and a happy new year!
